The only thing I would want as a bonus was a jet stage to this theme.

Hell, I even modded this song into Project M for the Lylat Cruise stage, and it was amazing!

snippet.textDisplay: Not only a tribute in the song but also in the scene, all is in a hijacked motorcycle and you ride in a long highway (and a bridge) shooting baddies and avoiding crashes, it is a perfect homage to After Burner, if you can get the game, you won't be disappointed.

snippet.textDisplay:
@SupraDarky 

It's pretty much a feminine Devil May Cry with better combat and, IMO, better boss fights. The QTEs make the game even more exciting. And the unlockables make this game complete. That's a lot better than expensive DLC like Street Fighter 4's costumes.
snippet.textOriginal:
@SupraDarky 

It's pretty much a feminine Devil May Cry with better combat and, IMO, better boss fights. The QTEs make the game even more exciting. And the unlockables make this game complete. That's a lot better than expensive DLC like Street Fighter 4's costumes.

snippet.textDisplay: @SupraDarky PLAY IT ! Trust me. I recently finished it and it's a great game. I'll give it a 9/10 only because i don't like the site of blood. The sound track is banging. Rivals the like of Persona 3 and 4 soundtracks. This song you have up here is a remix of the classic outrun which is great but there are some original background music in this game that is better in my opinion. Don't get the ost to listen to it just yet. Play the game 1st so you can be shock and amazed.
snippet.textOriginal: @SupraDarky PLAY IT ! Trust me. I recently finished it and it's a great game. I'll give it a 9/10 only because i don't like the site of blood. The sound track is banging. Don't get the ost to listen to it just yet. Play the game 1st so you can be shock and amazed.
